Jessica Zafra-Tanaka is an interdisciplinary researcher specializing in non-communicable diseases, mixed-methods studies, and patient engagement. She is currently affiliated with the CRONICAS Center of Excellence in Chronic Diseases at Universidad Peruana Cayetano Heredia and pursuing a PhD at the University Hospitals of Geneva. 

Her work involves managing research projects, developing clinical guidelines, and engaging in public health initiatives. With a strong background in epidemiology and a passion for improving healthcare systems, Jessica aims to enhance care for chronic conditions through innovative and patient-centered research approaches.
